attributes.action: keep the Local Post Office's open.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ask the Prime Minister to keep the Post Office's around the country open and stop the closure of them.  The general public are getting sick and tired of having the heart of their local community taken away.  Having to travel further and at more cost instead of being able to walk to your "local" Post Office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
